body_html: Hi @benoitsteiner, such a change may make it difficult if workspace.bzl were to be updated to a version of protobuf which introduced another platform quirk. Is it potentially more robust to manage them independently, given that cmake can target a boarder range of platforms?
body_text: Hi @benoitsteiner, such a change may make it difficult if workspace.bzl were to be updated to a version of protobuf which introduced another platform quirk. Is it potentially more robust to manage them independently, given that cmake can target a boarder range of platforms?
body: Hi @benoitsteiner, such a change may make it difficult if workspace.bzl were to be updated to a version of protobuf which introduced another platform quirk. Is it potentially more robust to manage them independently, given that cmake can target a boarder range of platforms?
